parameters.info: HDF5 file(s)
parameters.name: hdf5files

parameters.info: Blank MS used as template
parameters.name: blank-ms

parameters.info: Output MS
parameters.name: output-ms

parameters.info: Produce quad circular polarisation. (RR, RL, LR, LL) *** Currently just relabels the linear pols ****
parameters.name: circular

parameters.info: Overwrite MS file if it already exists
parameters.name: overwrite

parameters.info: Reference antenna (default is first one used by script)
parameters.name: ref-ant

parameters.info: Tar-ball the MS
parameters.name: tar

parameters.info: Produce a full polarisation MS in CASA canonical order (HH, HV, VH, VV). Default is to produce HH,VV only
parameters.name: full-pol

parameters.info: More verbose progress information
parameters.name: verbose

parameters.info: Use W term to stop fringes for each baseline
parameters.name: stop-w

parameters.info: Select polarisation products to include in MS from HH,VV,HV,VH, default is all available from HH,VV
parameters.name: pols-to-use

parameters.info: Print command to convert MS to miriad uvfits in casapy
parameters.name: uvfits

parameters.info: MeasurementSet will exclude autocorrelation data
parameters.name: no-auto

parameters.info: Range of frequency channels to keep (zero-based inclusive 'first_chan,last_chan', default is all channels)
parameters.name: channel-range

parameters.info: Flag elevations outside the range 'lowest_elevation,highest_elevation'
parameters.name: elevation-range

parameters.info: Add MODEL_DATA and CORRECTED_DATA columns to the MS. MODEL_DATA initialised to unity amplitude zero phase, CORRECTED_DATA initialised to DATA.
parameters.name: model-data

parameters.info: List of online flags to apply (from 'static,cam,data_lost,ingest_rfi,cal_rfi,predicted_rfi', default is all flags, '' will apply no flags)
parameters.name: flags

parameters.info: Output time averaging interval in seconds, default is no averaging.
parameters.name: dumptime

parameters.info: Bin width for channel averaging in channels, default is no averaging
parameters.name: chanbin

parameters.info: If a single element in an averaging bin is flagged, flag the averaged bin.
parameters.name: flagav
